mapper.sql: ${alias}.legislation_id AS ${alias}_legislation_id, ${alias}.country AS ${alias}_country, ${alias}.datetime AS ${alias}_datetime, ${alias}.organism AS ${alias}_organism, ${alias}.type AS ${alias}_type, ${alias}.name AS ${alias}_name, ${alias}.observation AS ${alias}_observation, ${alias}.link AS ${alias}_link, ${alias}.component AS ${alias}_component
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM legislation legislation WHERE legislation.country = #{country}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO legislation (legislation_id, country, datetime, organism, type, name, observation, link, component) VALUES (#{legislation_id}, #{country}, #{datetime}, #{organism}, #{type}, #{name}, #{observation}, #{link}, #{component}) ON CONFLICT (legislation_id) DO UPDATE SET country = #{country}, datetime = #{datetime}, organism = #{organism}, type = #{type}, name = #{name}, observation = #{observation}, link = #{link}, component = #{component};
